name: Spicy Tequila Sour
description: A sour and spicy take on the Margarita.
steps: Cut three small slices of jalapeno and muddle in the bottom of a cocktail shaker with simple syrup.
Add lime juice, pineapple juice, tequila, and egg white.
Add ice and shake for a further 20 seconds.
footnote: Garnish with a slice of jalapeno.
